Description:
Good Things In Small Packages
Great street position, great neighbourhood and a great little house. Make a splash into the property market at 8 Carapooka Avenue Clifton Springs. Plenty of space on the 585m2 block for shedding and storage with the home situated to the front of the block. Central to the water, schools and shopping in this quiet, established street.
Three bedrooms with BIRs, one bathroom and an undercover outdoor area situated adjacent to the living area. Just bring along your personal touches and there is a home on the beautiful Bellarine in the making.
This one will not last so contact the agent early!
Insights: 8 Carapooka Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Private Retreat in the Golf Course Precinct
Nestled in the middle of the golf course precinct, within an easy walk to the Clifton Springs Golf Club clubhouse, The Dell swimming beach and Clifton Springs Clifftop walking tracks, this sandstone property is ideal for those looking for a quiet Bellarine Peninsula position. The home comprises 3 bedrooms, master with full ensuite and WIR, central bathroom, formal lounge or theater room, open plan living with polished Jarrah flooring flowing onto the North facing deck. Light filled living and well-appointed kitchen with dining area make this property a joy to live in, whilst the 2 living spaces and alfresco space allow for all year round entertaining in your own private retreat. Ducted heating, reverse cycle SS cooling, ample off street car parking & private landscaped gardens compliment the brilliant design and orientation of this desirable position.
Insights: 25 Catalina Crescent, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
What A Little Ripper!
Sometimes a property just grabs your attention and you simply just want to make it 'home' - this is that property!!
Don't be fooled by this property's understated facade as it is an exceptional prospect. A tree lined court location sets the theme for a lovely relaxed and tranquil setting for this fully renovated three bedroom home.
A fine light 'n' bright renovation is enhanced by a tilted roof line and various windows for lovely filtered light. The kitchen is modern and offers excellent storage solutions. The bathroom is a real head turner; complete with floor to ceiling tiles and crisp modern finishes. Ducted heating and split system air conditioning ensure you can make this property home from day one!
Boasting an approximate 18m frontage this property offers the high demand property feature of rear access for the cars, boat and a caravan. An impressive 10m x 7m (approximate) garage/shed simply wants for nothing; fully powered (including 15 amp power outlet), mezzanine storage, remote controlled roller door and glass sliding doors to rear offers a myriad of options for the incoming purchaser. The wide open spaces of a good old fashioned back yard provide further size and scope for the imagination to run wild.
Although it is difficult to just isolate one, my personal favourite feature of this home is a full equipped and expansive decked entertaining area; complete with main's gas connection for the BBQ, downlights, exhaust fan and a sheltered area for early coffee or a late wine.
A court location with the added advantage of a pedestrian lane way to Jetty Road places you only short stroll to the Clifton Springs Primary School and the Jetty Road Reserve. For the boating enthusiast the property is perfectly positioned with the Clifton Springs Boast Ramp literally just down the road.
A wonderful home for today and a great investment for the future.
Insights: 24 Allara Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 18 Water Vistas Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Double Storey with Panoramic Bay Views
Boasting a large balcony with uninterrupted north facing panoramic views over the bay, located in a quiet court, close to the town centre, schools, the beach, the jetty, the golf club and more, this dream property could be your reality. With an enviable and flexible layout this is one everyone should get excited about and is sure to appeal to many.
- 4 generous size bedrooms + study, or 5th bedroom
- Master bedroom features walk through robe and ensuite with large walk in shower
- Bathroom with luxurious spa bath
- 2 living areas plus retreat
- Large balcony with panoramic views of Geelong, Melbourne and the You Yang's
- Fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and ample cupboard space
- Servers window connecting kitchen to the outside alfresco entertaining area
- Generous sized laundry with storage cupboards and bench
- Down stairs powder room and toilet
- Large remote drive through double garage with internal access
- Exposed aggregate concrete driveway and back entertaining area
- Spacious backyard with storage shed
- Quiet court location with playground
- Property's views are protected by a covenant from being built out
- 1.5km from Golf Club, Jetty and the Beach
- 2.5km from Drysdale town centre
- 1km from Primary School and Milk Bar
- 20km from Geelong CBD
Contact for an Inspection

Description:
A designer coastal lifestyle waits
This attractive coastal precinct, set on the outskirts of Clifton Springs, embodies the contemporary trend of a 'designer coastal lifestyle'.
The established estate is treed and undulating, featuring quiet streets that lead down to a picturesque spot. Rich with native flora and fauna, this land has a relaxed coastal feel with in vogue homes set on spacious blocks.
This allotment, of 620 sqm approx., sits quietly in a desirable location with little through traffic. It boasts a westerly outlook to the kerb and morning sun to the rear. The long northern aspect is ideal for contemporary architecture with plenty of winter sun filling multiple living spaces. Boundaries measurements approx. 28 metres by 22 metres.
This block neighbours attractive properties with an appreciation of privacy and space. And, with no fixed timeframe for commencement and all services available, it's ready for you to plan your dream home!
Close to a choice of schools, great family amenities and the beach. 20 mins to Geelong. 90 mins to Melbourne.
Create your designer lifestyle here!
- 620 sqm block in a desirable coastal estate on the quiet outskirts of Clifton Springs
- Treed, undulating estate featuring quiet streets
- Close to a choice of schools, great family amenities and close to the shops
- Westerly outlook to the kerb, morning sun to the rear
- Long boundary for contemporary light-filled architecture
- Create a designer coastal lifestyle at the gateway of the Bellarine
Insights: 47 Delungra Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Make an offer. Stunning water views
Panoramic outlook encompassing views of the City of Greater Geelong, The You Yangs, Corio Bay & the City of Melbourne. Imagine life on your new two storey balcony watching the shipping lanes in Corio Bay & the city lights at night.
Set amongst quality homes close to private & public schools with easy access to shopping.
CLifton Springs has a safe boating harbour in Corio Bay offering great catches of King George Whiting, Calamari & Snapper.
One of the greatest secrets getting out is the sandy beaches providing safe swimming & great snorkeling opportunities in the shallow waters.
The Port Phillip Ferry service is creating a buzz for those who work in Melbourne & want to live a lifestyle.
Opportunities for this desirable location are few & far between.
Insights: 28 Panoramic Terrace, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Fantastic Family Home
Perfectly located within easy reach of bayside beaches and community assets, this spacious four bedroom home will offer you an enviable lifestyle of convenience. An already ample floor plan boasting two living zones, two bathrooms and a fantastic alfresco patio flooded with east sun, flowing on to a good size, low maintenance back garden.
The master suite is perfectly placed to the front of the home, offering privacy and solitude from the active hub. A neat and tidy ensuite bathroom and walk in robe complete this quiet adults retreat. North facing aspects to the second lounge area provide natural light and warmth, with lovely outlooks across the well manicured front gardens. An enclosed sunroom or spa room, surrounded by lush ferns offers further external living space.
Enjoy being within easy reach of award winning wineries and eateries across the Bellarine, well situated within an area highly regarded for its outstanding organic produce. Water sportsman will be easily pleased, boat ramps gifting access to fishing opportunities within the Bay. This property won't last long so be sure to inspect today!
- 4BR family home, offering dual living spaces within easy reach of Port Phillip and Swan Bay
- Northern aspects are welcomed in the formal lounge room and substantial master suite
- Fantastic outdoor patio, private and spacious, harnessing beautiful morning sunshine
- Ducted heating for winter comfort, DLUG, garden shed and separate outdoor sunroom
- Local schools, sporting facilities and community assets are all within close proximity
Insights: 44 Thamballina Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 33 Clear Water Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
BAY VIEWS, BACKS ONTO THE GOLF CLUB, PRIME SPOT ON THE BELLARINE PENINSULA
A coveted position, just 3 house blocks to the Country Club/Golf Club and the Dell; your back yard is the gate to the 9th hole. Walk to the club house, bowls, dinner or beach without ever having to take out the car. Comprises open plan living with a very generous family dining area. The lounge also has study area, the front sun room (fully glazed) creates a perfect space to just relax and delight in the views, doors open to the balcony where you can enjoy the magic sunsets!
Light and bright throughout with well-equipped kitchen, superb central bathroom , all three bedrooms are spacious with BIR's, powder room and laundry. Features include quality fixtures and fittings, Bosch appliances, electric sun blinds, tinted windows, R/C Air Con., ample storage, nothing but the best here at No. 33. Double garage, carport and plenty of room for boat/caravan. Natural light which tops off this classy renovation. This is a stylish home.

Description:
You Snooze You Lose!
The Facts (In Short):
-Undoubtedly one of the best entry level buying opportunities in today's property market
-Neat as a pin 3 bedroom home right in the heart of the Clifton Springs Golf Club Precinct
-Corner allotment; 628m2 (approximately) land holding; x2 drive way cross overs
-Expansive decked entertaining/alfresco zone
The Features:
My guess it will be standing room only when we take this 'gem' to the open market - it represents what I would consider one of the best entry level buying opportunities for 2017. Perfectly positioned a short stroll from the Clifton Springs Golf Club and with the well renowned Clifton Springs Boat Ramp literally just down the road gives this property a perfect AAA location rating.
The property itself is a ripper and is as neat as a pin! A lovely orientation ensures this property is bathed in an abundance of natural light. 3 bedrooms all have built in robes. A generous L-shaped lounge/dining boasts big windows providing a lovely connection 'inside to out'. The expansive decked entertaining zone spans 8.1m x 3.9m (approximately) and is exceptional; it provides a lovely sheltered area for entertaining your guests and from its elevated position captures lovely cool summer breezes. A substantial land holding of approximately 628m, a corner allotment with dual driveway crossovers and secure x2 carport with roller door gives the incoming purchaser a pleather of options only limited to their imagination. The modern comforts of ducted heating, wall mounted air conditioner and ceiling fans ensures this property ticks all the boxes.
Insights: 7 Bambra Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding Bayside Location.
Here’s your opportunity to purchase a quality family home in the flourishing Clifton Springs real estate market. Clifton Springs Boat Harbour, schools, shops are all in close proximity with access to public transport only minutes walk. The floor plan highlights 3 bedrooms, a renovated central bathroom, 2 living areas & an open plan modern kitchen/meals. The home is temperature controlled by two reverse cycle air-conditioners providing ample heating and cooling throughout the home. A large alfresco dining and entertaining area via the kitchen/meals is ideal for hosting family functions or just entertaining while taking in the picturesque views of “Corio Bay”. The home is positioned on 585sqm allotment with established low maintenance gardens. If you are looking for the opportunity to buy a property that is in immaculate condition, or an investment property without the hassle of renovations or simply wanting to make the sea change to the Bellarine Peninsula, 17 Kanyanya Avenue is well worth an inspection.

Description:
Unique Character. Lifestyle. Location. Views. Double Block. It's amazing.
This is special. A beautifully presented Victorian character home with modern fixtures and appliances, set on a massive double block 1,194 m2 approx. with a delightful established garden, and superb elevated views of the bay.
The home is full of period detail - from reproduction light fittings, special wallpapers and feature tiles, to leadlight windows, crafted woodwork cabinetry, and even a brass-footed bath.
But while it reflects an era past, it also embraces contemporary luxury with features like signature branded kitchen appliances, ceiling fans, 3 KW-10 solar panels and a ceiling-mounted TV projector with a pull-down screen.
Add to all this charm and comfort a beautiful established garden - with silver birches, roses, snowball trees, lavender, azaleas, fruit trees, a vegie patch, a pergola and a rotunda - and you have a wonderful ready-made lifestyle to enjoy, entertain, and indulge in.
- Charming entry to sitting/dining room with gas log fire
- Central tiled hall to kitchen, laundry, bathroom, lounge
- Galley kitchen with Bosch and Miele appliances and pantry
- Three downstairs bedrooms, master upstairs - ensuite, views
- Office to courtyard, garden, double garage/storage shed
- Great Clifton Springs location, drive to shops, harbour, bay
Insights: 14-16 Carapooka Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Live the Dream!
Set on 778sqm in a prized court location, this beautifully presented home with lovely exposures features 4 bedrooms with built-in-robes. 2 living spaces include lounge room with gas fireplace and in-built shelving, while the formal dining room with classic French doors overlooks magnificent gardens. Dominating the heart of the residence, a superbly-designed kitchen is every chef's dream! Culinary skills can be put to the test with conventional oven, steam oven and 90cm cooktop with Teppanyaki, wok and induction cooking. Granite benchtops, breakfast bar, splashback, dishwasher, ample storage and soft-close drawers enhance its appeal. Whether you choose to socialise inside or venture outdoors to the covered dining/entertainment area which has the BBQ connected to the gas main, guests will impressed with the array of options on offer. A water tank and rear studio with power complete this property. Enjoy exceptional living within walking distance of shops, schools, tennis courts and boat ramp and only 4 minutes to Drysdale and 18 minutes to Geelong.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 9 Kirra Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 134 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Nothing Ordinary About Me!
You will feel you're on holidays all year round when you purchase this property. Set on a generous 654m2 allotment and renovated inside and out you can't help but feel you could be at your favourite holiday destination! A north facing deck runs along the side of the home and is large enough to entertain a large gathering under cover. The home offers open plan living with study nook and a kitchen you won't come across in a Metricon home. Sliding doors from the meals area lead out to a paved courtyard perfect for Sunday brunch. There is Tasmanian myrtle flooring in the living area and carpets to all bedrooms. Outside is located an extra large garage and workshop for the man of the house. Located handy to the golf course, boat ramp and foreshore and centrally situated to all the Bellarine Peninsula offers. An easy care garden completes the property. A must to inspect!
Insights: 134 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Your Coastal Life Starts Now!
Slightly elevated, the sweeping views of Geelong and the You Yangs on this block are glorious and facing west, a contemporary home would overlook spectacular sunsets and capture beautiful winter light. Set in a quiet cul-de-sac, this vacant block is an opportunity to build in a coveted hamlet of the Bellarine Peninsula, close to boat ramps, beaches and all that coastal living has to offer.
Situated in a court with no through traffic, this is an ideal location for a family home and the block, measuring approx. 585m2 offers space for a stunning home, the design of which is limited only by your imagination. A mature eucalypt at the front of the block could be the start of a stunning entryway.
Minutes to the beach, close to local schools , shops and recreational amenities, this is a prime location for building the coastal home of your dreams!
Insights: 7 Karrin Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2012.

Description:
Tranquil Living with Sweeping Bay Views
Spectacular bay views never to be built out are all yours to enjoy to the end of time. On the ground floor is the 3 very spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, ceiling fans & master has full ensuite. Here we also have a great sized study. Central bathroom has seperate shower, bath & lots of cupboards. Laundry is big & has rear yard access. Split level enormous open plan living zone perfect for games or family room features double doors opening to the pretty garden. Hidden bonus is the wine cellar underneath the stair case. Stairs take you up to the large modern kitchen including dishwasher plus an abundant dining area alongside. Also the expansive 2nd living zone with reverse cycle split system, it's here you will enjoy the bay as it changes all day watching the ships roll in & out. Outside you have a private rear yard, double car garage to store your boat at the end of the super long driveway perfect for all the families' cars. Lovely gardens both front & back to laze away & enjoy the day. Additional features are shining polished floor boards throughout & ducted gas heating downstairs. All sitting pretty on approximately 585m2 allotment in a quiet neighbourhood, close to the Dell, golf club, boat ramp, tennis courts, parks, local schools, public transport, medical facilities and new shopping centres. Move in, unpack & enjoy!
Insights: 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Rare chance for a large block - approx 902sqm
A warm welcome greets you at “Kinnego Cottage” with the white picket fence and vivid colour in the garden. The geometric outline of the chimney breast brings a focal point to the facade’s brickwork. Stepping inside via the verandah into the slate entry and comfortable L-shaped lounge and dining area. Creature comforts of the wood fire, a/c and gas wall unit will keep you cozy and cool for all-seasons. The kitchen is set on vintage cork flooring, with timber cabinetry, a retro St. George built-in oven, instant gas cooktop and dishwasher. The eastern facing casual eating area, (sliding door ext access) is the perfect spot for breakfast, bathed in morning sun. Down the hallway you will find the carpeted bedrooms, central bathroom, separate WC and galley style laundry with convenient exterior access. The master bedroom enjoys a WIR, and sliding doors out to the north facing paved patio. Overlooking beautiful roses, brings a cottage-garden focus to the room. The yard itself has extensive shedding and established fruit bearers: apple, lemon, lime and nectarine. While the property is tucked away, it is within proximity to the golf course, bowls club, boat ramp/marina. Plus living here you can enjoy the walking trails with sweeping views across Corio Bay to panoramic backdrop of the You Yangs. An original three bedroom home in excellent condition, set on a magnificent block, this property built with single-level ease will suit first home buyers, young families or could make an addition to an investor’s portfolio. Land size 902 sqm approx.
Insights: 3 Boondi Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Land for business and views
This bayside land offers stunning views over Port Phillip Bay to the You Yangs and Geelong - a renowned view that’s spectacular by day and dreamy by night! Zoned ‘commercial’, and with practical corner placement on busy Whitcombes Road, this block is well-placed for a business premises with a scenic apartment upstairs. Set within an enclave of existing businesses with client parking at the facade. Minutes from Drysdale village. 25 minutes to Geelong. Live and work in one picturesque place, or make your business dollar work twice as hard with an investment property above. View without delay!

Address: 189 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
So Much To Offer!
This quality built home is a rare find these days. Sitting on an generous 849m2 allotment and offering some lovely views across the 15th green of the Clifton Springs Golf course towards the bay & Geelong. At the rear of the home the spacious open plan living takes in the wonderful treed vistas of the golf course and beyond. The master suite is generously proportioned as are the 2 minor bedrooms. All have robes. Both bathrooms have had recent updates and are sleek and modern. A gas log fire and split system air conditioner keep the home comfortable through all weather conditions. The double garage has a single drive-through roller door to the yard and internal access into the home. If lifestyle and location is high on your wish list then don't hesitate to view this exceptional property and perhaps make it yours!

Description:
Truly Exceptional Bay Views!
This delightful family home is set perfectly on the block to take in all of the stunning bay views that are on offer! The double storey home incorporates 3 bedrooms and family bathroom downstairs with internal access to an extra large double garage with high roller doors allowing for van or boat storage. There is also a terrific undercover sun-room on this level which is large enough to cater for family gatherings. All rooms on this level have doors that open to the outdoors. Views also from this level of the home. Upstairs is the spacious family living zones. Formal lounge room with access to a timber deck perfect for relaxing whilst reading a book or sipping on a wine. The family room, meals and kitchen areas are combined and all take in stunning bay views that need to be seen to appreciate fully. A small study adjoins the family room. Another single garage plus carport allows ample vehicle accommodation. With so much to offer an inspection is a must!

Description:
Watch The Bay Change All Day
Enjoy the ever changing bay and You Yang views from this impressive multi-level steel framed 4 bedroom plus study family home. Step inside to open plan living with stylish kitchen, walk in pantry, dishwasher, ceramic cook top and electric oven. Gas heater and reverse cycle split system in the light filled lounge which opens to the outdoor entertaining area on the deck that wraps the upper level. The first bedroom is also on this level with built in robes. On the middle level you will enjoy a generous study, bedroom number two with robes and the master bedroom with walk in robes. Central large bathroom with spa bath and separate toilet. Third level has the fourth spacious bedroom with built in robes. Second family/rumpus room with sliding doors to paved pergola. Mega sized laundry with bench and plenty of storage. This ground level also has the 2nd bathroom with toilet and shower, perfect for after beach use. This level is ideal as guest quarters or a retreat for the teenager in the family. Outside you have a tranquil low maintenance native garden with shed. Single carport and off street parking for three cars. Plenty of space for a boat or caravan down the side to tick another box off your list. All sitting pretty on approximately 585m2 allotment in a quiet neighbourhood, close to boat ramp, golf club, tennis courts, parks, local schools, public transport, medical facilities and new shopping centre.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
